name: John H.
content: This is how you build a business, folks. Be professional. Be on time. Be friendly. And be good at what you do.And these gents are doing it right. They responded to my quote request almost immediately. They arrived early to the appointment. They were friendly. And they were quick to repair the broken screen. And they offered extra phone protection with a glass screen cover.You may find a (slightly) cheaper repair. You may find someone available immediately. But you won't find this service and value elsewhere.And yes, I am typing this review on my cell phone. I can do that now that the gentlemen have repaired the cracked screen.John

name: Kishore L.
content: While I was looking for someone to fix the broken screen of my wife's iPhone 6plus, I came across numerous options on Yelp. Thanks to the "Request quote" feature , I was able to fan out a quote request to multiple vendors. The first response that I got , within a minute , was from Jacob. And none of the others were able to beat the price quoted by JacobThe fact that they offer a mobile repair service was an added bonus considering our unpredictable schedules. Set up an appointment for next day at my workplace. Jacob and Devin showed up a bit earlier in fact They were extremely professional , knowledgable ,got down to work without wasting a second. And replaced the broken screen in a jiffy. Also offered a tempered glass protector for a discount. The phone looked neat and new but I noticed some lines showing up when the screen was black. I just called them again to check if anything was wrong. They absolutely didn't mind coming back and checked once again. I really appreciate the honesty of these guys for I'm sure 9/10 times I would have gotten a response that it was an existing fault with the phone if I had gone else where to fix the screen. Jacob did admit it was a problem with the screen(albeit the first instance for a 6 plus screen )and instantly replaced with another one without any issuesOn the whole it was a smooth process and would definitely seek out these guys if anything untoward happens to our phones  in the future

name: Chris R.
content: These gentlemen were extremely professional. Highly communicative, arrived on-time, provided a very reasonable price, and exceeded my expectations for getting the job done well and in a short amount of time.  Would recommend these guys to anyone looking to get a phone repaired!

name: Solehjon S.
content: Really quick service. They changed my screen in 10 minutes. Definitely recommend to everyone.

name: Adrianne B.
content: These guys were great!  Arrived on time (even a little early) and finished in less than 10 minutes.  The price was totally reasonable and they did awesome work.  Looks like a new iphone =)  Thanks guys!

name: Cinaith G.
content: Great service! They fixed my phone in less than 15 mins!

name: Mattie P.
content: I called them last week to get a quote for my smashed iPhone screen. They were the cheapest bid that I could find for the quality I wanted. I called them back and they scheduled a time for them to come to me and fix my phone. Both of the gentlemen that came were very kind with positive attitudes which is what everyone would want from a company. They added a screen protector in hopes that I wouldn't drop my phone again but in case it did it wouldn't break. I would definitely recommend them to anyone who needs to fix there broken phone. If my screen ever does crack again, I know who I'm calling.

name: Nicholas H.
content: These guys were freakin quick, reasonably priced, awesome, understand prompt and accurate communications, and are HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.  I've put their business card on the fridge for ANY future issues (hopefully not anytime soon).  They repaired my iPhone 6 64GB Silver within 10 minutes of arriving.  They were super nice and I enjoyed talking with them.  It's obvious they're all about customer service, something that is becoming more and more of a ghost in this country.  A+++. Thanks guys!

name: Jacob N.
content: Jacob came out and repaired my phone where I was. Which was great. YAY!Super nice guy and would recommend him to anyone!

name: Dave G.
content: Great service and super quick! They even had tempered glass screen protectors available so hopefully my screen won't break again!

name: Ana C.
content: Awesome guys! They just fixed my badly cracked screen and put a protector on in less than 20 minutes! Definitely recommend them as they come to you and make everything a convenient experience

name: Angeline T.
content: Nice guys, professional, knowledgeable and they make it extremely convenient by coming to you! Highly recommend to anyone that needs their screen replaced. Thanks for the great service!

name: Robert P.
content: Jacob and devin are 2 guys you need to know for sure.  They have an excellent mobile service,  have the best prices,  super friendly and super fast at what they do.  They came to my house fixed my girls cracked iPhone in less than 20 min.  I have never recommended anyone as highly as i do these guys.  Very professional,  if you don't call these guys you don't like quality. I will be telling everyone i know to call these guys!

name: Alejandra M.
content: Jacob was awesome! I cracked the screen of my iPhone 6 at 9 am and it was fixed before 12:30 pm. Great service and great job!!!

name: Jimmy S.
content: Fast and cheap and they come to you. They fixed my phone while I was working, which was very convenient! Highly recommend!! Very professional, good communication.

name: Thanh C.
content: Great service, good guys, good price!  They're not only fast and efficient but also very proficient in what they do.  I'd come back again if ever my phone cracks again!  :)

name: Mark S.
content: These guys are great! Will definitely do business with them again, if my phone breaks. Lol

name: Shaon R.
content: Awesome guys: Jacob and DevinThese guys came out on short notice. Called on the morning on black Friday and they answered and actually waited 30 mins at the located for us to finish shopping at MCAS Miramar. They were very polite and professional.  Thank you for all you guys did for us. IPhone repair san diego

name: Brad W.
content: FAST! CONVENIENT! EFFICIENT! AFFORDABLE! On top of all that; Jacob and Devin are two gentleman you will enjoy talking with in the short time it takes to fix your device.

name: Kevin Z.
content: Awesome dudes. Punctual, speedy, and my phone looks as good as new. I was so glad to learn there's an alternative to going to the Apple store. This was so much better than dealing with mall parking!
